_meta.purpose: k-ω channel flow - NONDIMENSIONAL at Re_tau=590
_meta.notes: Pseudo-transient to steady state with adaptive dt

geom._comment: Half-channel [0,δ] with symmetry at top. Ly=δ=1, Ny halved.

turb._comment_omega_min: Floor on omega to prevent nu_t runaway. omega_min=10 best for U+, lower values improve k+ but over-damp velocity.
turb._comment_C_lim: Durbin realizability: nu_t <= C_lim*k/(sqrt(6)*|S|). Set 0 to disable. Only used by wilcox2006.

solve._comment_under_relax: k/omega use under_relax_k_omega, nu_t uses under_relax_nu_t (more aggressive damping)
